title: Structured Interaction Specification
spec: Architecture: Transition DLR_INTERACTION_RPT from flat strings to a structured object-based Citation model. Logic: Claims specify Tool, Command, and Args to allow 1:1 boolean matching in compliance.js. Rationale: Eliminates semantic ambiguity in audits and identifies both Omissions and Unclaimed (shadow) actions. Standard: Must be generated via Oracle Blueprint to ensure schema compliance.
